OOC: Dont leave, Hollywood, brother! This may not be the nWo but NBW is 4 life! The whole RPG is having some bad times right now. The only way we will bounce back is with everyone here, and working to do so. We need you. We need everyone! And if you want to get back on top again, I can end this only one way....... "To be the man, you got to beat the man!" As Ric Flair has always said. I hope you make the choice to stay, brother. Whoooooooooo!

--Boundary_(ID_t+aHs8LtwIqb+wc3kpGN8w)
